Professional Regulations

Green Orbit Digital operates in accordance with UK laws and regulations governing digital marketing and consultancy services. We adhere to data protection regulations under the UK GDPR and the Data Protection Act 2018.

Disclaimer

The information provided on this website is for general informational purposes only. While we strive to keep the information up to date and correct, Green Orbit Digital makes no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability, or availability with respect to the website or the information, products, services, or related graphics contained on the website for any purpose. Any reliance you place on such information is therefore strictly at your own risk.

External Links

This website may contain links to external websites for your convenience. Green Orbit Digital does not endorse or take responsibility for the content or availability of these external sites.

Privacy & Data Protection

Please see our Privacy Policy for information on how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

Complaints & Dispute Resolution

Should you have any complaints about our services or content, please contact us directly at contact@greenorbit.academy. We are committed to resolving issues amicably and swiftly.

For disputes that cannot be resolved amicably, the courts of England and Wales shall have exclusive jurisdiction.

Accessibility Statement

Green Orbit Digital strives to ensure our website is accessible to everyone, including users with disabilities. We are continuously working to improve accessibility standards.
